main.name: Rahul Meghani
main.occupation: Graduate Student at University of Windsor
main.description: Looking to cement a place in Software engineering industry
main.bio: Hi there! I am Rahul! I'm pursuing my Masters degree in Applied Computing at University of Windsor. I am a firm believer of the idea that learning should never stop and this ideology has kept me going till date. I'm actively looking for co-op opportunities in Software engineering roles

education.description: Graduated with First Class Honours. Relevant Coursework: Object Oriented Programming, Operating System, Software Engineering
Relevant Coursework: Advanced Computing Concepts, Advanced Software Engineering topics, Distributed Databases, Big Data Management and Analytics, Computer Networks and Security

work.title: Business Analyst - Software Implementations
work.description: Supported projects throughout their entire lifecycle, incl. scoping, design, development, testing deployment and post-production

projects.title: Metaverse Web3.0 chat app (React JS & Moralis)

testimonials.text: Rahul is a pleasure to work with! He takes initiative, troubleshoots with an open mind and determination, and has become a true Medallia software implementer and guru. I highly recommend Rahul to any team, with no hesitation. I canâ€™t wait to see what he does next!
